name: Slice, Dice & Rice
description: Slice Dice & Rice is an indie fighting game with no health bars. Inspired by Bushido Blade, it revolves around the idea of finding an opening in opponents defense and ending the round with a single, clean hit.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 8.1 or newer 处理器: Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz 内存: 2 GB RAM 图形: GeForce 9800 GT with 512 MB RAM (DirectX 10) DirectX 版本: 10
recommended_requirements: 推荐配置: 操作系统: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 8.1 or newer 处理器: Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz 内存: 4 GB RAM 图形: Vidia Geforce GTX660  with 1 GB RAM (DirectX 11) DirectX 版本: 11
